entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 06:54 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
